question:
Which among the following is/ are correct about the Philip-Duff Committee?
1. It was appointed to examine the issue of merger of Odia speaking areas
2. Its recommendation was in favor of the merger
3. Simon commission accepted the recommendation
Choose the correct option from the codes given below :
explanation: Philip duff committee was appointed in 1924. Simon commission accepted the recommendation of this committee and suggested the government to set up a boundary commission.
